lead_paragraph: An article on Friday about Kelly Bruno, an amputee who competes in triathlons and who is a ball girl at the United States Open, referred incorrectly to her finish this year at the International Triathlon Union World Championships. She was third in her category for athletes with a disability, not third over all.
